tool_description: Generates comprehensive licensing agreements based on deal parameters, territory specifications, and standard industry terms.

licensee_name.description: Name of the party receiving the license

territory_codes.description: Territory codes covered by this license

distribution_rights.description: Distribution rights included: theatrical, streaming, broadcast, dvd, digital_download

error_messages: Invalid date range: license_end_date must be after license_start_date.
Invalid territory codes: One or more territory codes are not recognized ISO country codes.
Invalid distribution rights: Use valid rights from [theatrical, streaming, broadcast, dvd, digital_download].
Invalid exclusivity type: Use one of [exclusive, non_exclusive, co_exclusive].
Invalid financial terms: minimum_guarantee, advance_payment must be >= 0; revenue_share_percentage must be 0-100.
Missing required parties: licensor_name and licensee_name cannot be empty.
Invalid currency: Use valid ISO 4217 currency code.
usage: Provide all required deal parameters including parties, content, territories, dates, rights, and exclusivity. Financial terms are optional but recommended for complete agreements.

agreement_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated agreement

contract_template.description: Full text of the licensing agreement

territory_list.description: List of territories covered by the agreement

financial_summary.description: Overview of financial terms and obligations
